original_title: Je ne te reverrai plus, ô mon bien-aimé Kampuchea!
overview: A short film, “I shall never see you again, oh my beloved Kampuchea”, was directed and scripted by the late His Majesty King Sihanouk, filmed in North Korea in 1991, depicts the Vietnamese annexation of Kampuchea Krom through the eyes of a Khmer Princes and classical dancer living in the Vietnamese palace.
title: I Shall Never See You Again, Oh My Beloved Kampuchea
